name: The Silent Net
body:
### Welcome to The Silent Net
A work in progress.

The Silent Net (otherwise known as the sNet) is a decentralized, distributed network that uses a chain-based algorithm to allow the registration, the modification and the access of free `domains` via a fast and efficient database system.

The result is a peer-to-peer network that provides fast connection to the `domain` you wish to visit.

[Learn more about registering a domain and hosting a site here] (https://github.com/JoshMiles/TheSilentNet/wiki/Registering-a-domain-&-hosting-your-new-site)

### Current Network Status

Network status: `offline.`

### The Silent Net Development Team
@JoshMiles

@SplittyDev

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with The Silent Net? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/JoshMiles/TheSilentNet/wiki) or [create a new issue ticket](https://github.com/JoshMiles/TheSilentNet/issues/new) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
